data.system_settings: Latest OS X El Capitan, Discord Canary and iOS 10.2.1 latest Testflight build.
data.expected_result: Role mention is in the embed and colors like it is on PC
data.short_description: Role mentions in embeds are displayed as '@deleted-role' on iOS
